channel.title: Npc dialogue help
channel.description:
Heh I need help for my 317.
Can anyone tell me what i put instead of [code] case 15: talk("This tunnel does not look safe.", 649); break;[/code] to make it look like this?
[URL=http://img269.imageshack.us/i/npcdialogue.png/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/2664/npcdialogue.png[/img][/URL]
the 649 has to be replaced with player something but i can't seem to figure this out. furthermore, is this even possible to do with a 317
